title: Canada Higher Education House
description: A site for researching and applying for scholarships in canada

hero.title: Canada Higher Education House
hero.subtitle: Enriching the Canadian campus with the best and brightest

buckets.heading: A tool for researching and applying for scholarships in Canada

firstCard.heading: Canadian Higher Education
firstCard.description: Canadian Universities are consistently ranked among the very best in the world. Our programs are of the highest quality. Every field is represented on our campuses but there is also a lot of diversity. We invite you to explore the many opportunities we have right across our country.

secondCard.heading: Scholarship Opportunities
secondCard.description: CHEH is a member driven organization aimed at enabling Canadians and international student to attend the University and program of their choice. Complete our online application form to tell us why you want to attend a Canadian university. Good luck.

thirdCard.heading: Domestic and International Students
thirdCard.description: CHEH wants to: (a) Raise awareness of the excellence of Canadian higher education; (b) Create scholarship opportunities to aid students wishing to attend higher education in Canada; (c) Enrich the Canadian campus with the best and brightest students from Canada and around the world.

aboutUs.heading: About the Canadian Higher Education House
aboutUs.content: Welcome to the Canada Higher Education House. CHEH is committed to spreading the word about the quality of higher education in Canada. We aim to create opportunities for students from Canada and around the world to attend College or University with the support of earned scholarships. CHEHâ€™s comprehensive site will tell you more about the programs available at institutions across Canada as well as how you may earn scholarship support to attend. Come join us.
